text: ninnalentukeant daivamargattil yud'dham ceyyunnilla? mardditaraya purusanmarkkum strikalkkum kuttikalkkum ventiyum? avarea innane prarthiccukeantirikkunnavaran: "nannalute natha; marddakaraya janam vilasunna i nattil ninn nannale ni meacippikkename. ninre pakkal ninn nannalkk ni oru raksakane niscayiccutarename. ninre bhagattu ninn nannalkk oru sahayiye nalkename.â€
